original_text:
He saw that a resting place was good,
    and that the land was pleasant,
so he bowed his shoulder to bear,
    and became a servant at forced labor.
korean_text: 그는 쉴 곳을 보고 좋게 여기며 토지를 보고 아름답게 여기고 어깨를 내려 짐을 메고 압제 아래에서 섬기리로다

sentences.original_text: He saw that a resting place was good
and that the land was pleasant
so he bowed his shoulder to bear
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 짐을 지기 위해 어깨를 숙였고

sentences.original_text: and became a servant at forced labor
